label: Chemical
comment: Any clearly defined substance having a defined molecular composition.

datatypeProperties.comment: A common name, expressed as text, for this distinct chemical.
A date, time, date time, or other date time value that this person embarked upon a means of transport.
The textual description of the formula for this distinct chemical.
The percentage of the presence for this specified material.
A scientific name, expressed as text, for this trade product.
A synonym name, expressed as text, for this distinct chemical.
A code specifying a type of MDH health indication.

objectProperties.comment: An applicable toxicological hazardous material for this distinct chemical.
A prominent attribute or aspect of a product.
A prominent attribute or aspect of an object, such as recyclability of a product, which can meet customer needs without compromising the ability of future generations to meet their own needs.
A measurement of the range of the presence of an ingredient in this distinct chemical.
A collection of data for a piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence about the product.

referencedBy.comment: Any clearly defined substance having a defined molecular composition.
